name: Uncle Juicy's Fruit Slam
description:
WHO IS UNCLE JUICY?
You have been entered into a competition to create a new flavour of Uncle Juicy's Fabtabulous Soda. Draw your own flavour profile, get really really popular and ride the soda stream as far as possible!
+*. +*.+*. +*. +*. +*. +*.
CONTROLS
[A]/[D] to spin, [SPACE] to jump
.*+.*+.*+.*+.*+.*+.*+
MULTIPLAYER
You can host an online session with your closest friends via port opening and IP address sharing
.*+.*+.*+.*+.*+.*+.*+
This game is not complete.
It  is a TOJAM prototype.
